comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: The painting in the middle ended up in Göteborg Art Museum. It was painted in 1888, and depicts a garden party in the Dansh town Skagen, attended by the Kröyers artist firends and their families. /Lars L

comment.author: 48994160@N00
comment._content: This beautiful photo inspired me to let the no copyright meet the copyright. If you are interested you can take a look here: www.flickr.com/photos/carolinetamtama/4061198849/ Thanks for adding this photo to The Commons.
